data.title: Advanced AI for Healthcare Payer Solutions
data.meta_description: Explore Lyric AI's leading Healthcare Payer Solutions, integrating advanced analytics for payment integrity and efficiency. Unleash innovation today!
data.text:
Welcome to Lyric

Bringing simplicity to the business of care

We’re proud to be a leading AI healthcare technology company. With more than 30 years of payment accuracy expertise as ClaimsXten, our solutions leverage the power of machine learning, AI, and predictive analytics to empower health plan payers to increase payment accuracy and integrity.

The AI payment integrity solution

you can trust.

Our team has over 30 years of industry experience, with a 91% solutions services rating and a 4.6 out of 5 customer service rating.

99%

Customer Retention Rate

$12-$14B

Annual Savings Across our Customer Base

9/10

of the top payers work with us

Introducing LyricIQ, the evolution of payment integrity

LyricIQ is an AI-powered payment accuracy service that’s backed by our 30 years of unrivaled clinical content expertise. LyricIQ collects and evaluates customer data through a secure and straightforward integration.

This process identifies claims trends and forms predictive models for a comprehensive review. Leveraging AI-generated insights, Lyric’s seasoned team of data scientists and clinical experts identify potential opportunities for payment error reductions, cost savings, and future value realization. With the implementation of LyricIQ’s advanced technological capabilities, the timeline for data review and collection is reduced, transforming years and months into mere weeks.

Lyric will simplify the business of care

Our ambition is to be an AI-first platform sitting at the intersection of healthcare and fintech, providing simplified consumer and patient solutions to health plans and providers in the wake of value-based care. As Lyric, formerly ClaimsXten (CXT), we’re building our future upon our more than 30 years of expertise as a leader in payment accuracy solutions.

Our Heritage as a Market Leader

Our focus remains: to ensure our customers’ ongoing success by enhancing our ClaimsXten (CXT) product offerings and providing exceptional value.

How We’re Swiftly Evolving

We’ll use our expertise to build AI and technology based solutions while strategically offering partner editing capabilities through our pre-built integrations for faster speed to value.

Where We Are Going

Our holistic payment accuracy platform will proactively monitor the health of customers’ payment integrity programs.

Ethical AI underpins our entire approach.

We are building and evolving our AI payment accuracy technology to be fair, transparent, and respectful of privacy and safety.

Our AI system is designed to provide unbiased and fair solutions for all users by transparent practices in data collection, usage, testing AI systems for bias, and working with specialized partners for trust and safety.

We ensure our AI’s decision-making processes are transparent and easily comprehensible by human in the loop reviewers.

Data is securely protected and used in accordance with data governance policies.

We have defined responsibilities and procedures to evaluate AI decisions, always prioritizing human autonomy and safety.

Our Values

Character

We do what’s right. We are candid, act with the utmost integrity, and do not waver. We are transparent and optimistic. That’s why we are so widely trusted.

Commitment

We’re committed to both business and personal success, continuous improvement, and positive change.

Community

We are inclusive, take care of one another, and contribute to causes that support our communities.

Courage

We have the courage to act, to speak, to dream big, to decide, to take initiative, and lead.

Customer

We exist to serve our customers and champion fairness in the healthcare system. We treat both external and internal customers with prompt, consistent, and exemplary care.

Our Solutions

LyricIQ is an AI-powered payment accuracy service that’s backed by our 30 years of unrivaled clinical content expertise. LyricIQ collects and evaluates customer data through a secure and straightforward integration. Learn More

LyricIQ

Our Company History

1989

GMIS Started (ClaimCheck)

1990

Code Review Acquisition

1996

HBOC/GMIS Acquisition

1998

McKesson purchases HBOC

2005

McKesson purchases Intelliclaim (ClaimsXten)

2017

MHS merges to become Change Healthcare (CHC)

October 2022

Optum acquires CHC; ClaimsXten Portfolio divested to become stand-alone privately held company

April 2023

ClaimsXten Portfolio becomes Lyric AI; Lyric envisions simplifying the business of care building upon ClaimsXten rules engine and using innovative technology, including AI, blockchain, large language models, and more.

Careers at Lyric

Want to join our team?

Lyric is a haven for the curious and tenacious; a team who's driven by core behaviors rooted in integrity and trust. We value collaboration, innovation, and the chance to make a true difference in health care.

Lyric in the News

Join the Lyric mailing list for monthly updates Lyric events, webinars, podcasts, product updates and more!

Ready to maximize your savings?

Complete our contact form and we’ll reach out to you! Or please email: sales@lyric.ai.
